responseTitle: jMonkeyEngine  | Grizeldi's PBR Tutorial #2 - What are Light Probes?
title: Grizeldi's PBR Tutorial #2 - What are Light Probes?
content: Second part of my tutorial series in which I explain how to use jmonkeyengine’s Physically Based Rendering pipeline. In this part we answer the question what are the light probes and why do we need them.
contentPlain: Second part of my tutorial series in which I explain how to use jmonkeyengine’s Physically Based Rendering pipeline. In this part we answer the question what are the light probes and why do we need them.
